items.summary: Ensure a publicly reachable Finance Guides page exists at the route /finance-guides (and is not a 404). If the page/route does not exist, create a new React page component and register it in the TanStack Router route tree so it renders within the existing Layout (header/footer/main container unchanged).
Add a route constant for Finance Guides in frontend/src/routes.ts and use that constant consistently for routing and navigation linking.
Add “Finance Guides” to the main navigation menu in the existing navItems list (desktop and mobile). Append it without reordering or restyling existing items.
Ensure the Finance Guides page is publicly accessible (no authentication required, no conditional hiding). It must load correctly for anonymous users.
Apply non-homepage SEO behavior for the Finance Guides route consistent with other non-tool static pages (i.e., do not apply tool SEO; do not modify homepage SEO).
Update the static sitemap (frontend/public/sitemap.xml) to include the /finance-guides URL while leaving all existing sitemap entries unchanged.
